contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 27, 1912 D Victorian State Championships (A Grade)
Victorian State Championships (A Grade) 10 Sacred, March, Set Test and Own Choice Contest Victorian State Championships victorian-state-championships
Australia
A Grade
Set Test and Own Choice
Madame Butterfly
Ballarat Oval, Ballarat, Victoria, Australia A serious complication arose. Initially the Rozelle Band was acclaimed the winners being incorrectly awarded 95 pts for the Test & 93 for Own Choice + 188 pts Later it was discovered that they in fact received 92 pts for the Test . and Total of 185 pts Elevating Geelong Municipal to 1st place 186 pts & relegating Rozelle to 2nd place with a revised total of 185 pts
Feb. 21, 2020, 3:06 a.m. June 26, 2020, 8:53 a.m.
1 Geelong City Percy Jones Beethoven [arr. Round]
2 Rozelle William Partington The Valkyrie
3 Geelong Harbour Trust (Vic) Harry Shugg The Valkyrie
4 St Augustine Orphanage (Ballarat) Les Hoffman Oberon [unknown arranger]
5 City of Perth Brass Band Hugh McMahon Othello
6 Adelaide Tramways (SA) Christopher Smith Faust [Gounod, unknown arranger]
7 Manly Municipal Jerry Pheloung Samson and Delilah
